column2: Re: Grow Your Business With Google Workspace (Enterprise Gmail) at Aperture Labs — Closed Won — update Hi there — thanks for the interest in Google Workspace (Enterprise Gmail). I support Aperture Labs.    Happy to arrange a quick demo and share references. Re: Grow Your Business With Re: Gemini for Workspace at Monarch Travel — Demo Scheduled Hi there — thanks for the interest in Gemini for Workspace. I support Monarch Travel.    Happy to arrange a quick demo and share references.    Best regards,  Sales Development Representative Re: Grow Your Business With Re: Gemini for Workspace at Monarch Travel — Demo Scheduled Hi — thanks for reaching out about Gemini for Workspace. We're at Monarch Travel.    Our team is planning a pilot for Gemini for Workspace.    We have a few technical questions around SSO and data residency.    We’ll need flexibility on pricing given our seat count and multi-geo setup.    Our CFO would like to review the pricing structure this week.
